DOC.brief_summary: Development validation measure physician work motivation .
DOC.detailed_description: Not long ago , physician solo practitioner . Today , physicians work large , integrated delivery system , many employ hospital multispecialty group practice . These dramatic change physician work environment raise important question evolve physician payment care delivery model support undermine motivation ability deliver high-quality patient care . To evaluate impact workplace change motivate physician deliver good patient care , study aim develop accurate measure physician work motivation . Simultaneously , investigator plan test hypothesis role various workplace psychological factor physician ' work motivation . Namely , investigator hypothesize : 20 25 % variance work motivation explain psychological need satisfaction ; 5 10 % variance self-reported overall health status depression explain work motivation ; 5 % variation work motivation explain work see call ; 5 10 % variation medicine view call explain learn environment .
DOC.criteria: practice physician medical specialty resident physician medical specialty fourth year medical student US allopathic medical school physician without active medical license . resident physician without active medical license . fourth year medical student US osteopathic medical school
